=== Introduction ===

I live in the United States, hold a Bachelors and Masters degree in Electrical Engineering, and work in the networks industry. I have been using Ubuntu as an operating system for work and play for about 7 years. 

=== Areas of Specialization ===

* Audio 
* Networking

=== Short Term Goals ===

* Be a part of the Ubuntu BugSquad, get a mentor, and help triage bugs.
* After some experience, help in some of the bite-size dev tasks

=== Long Term Goals ===

* Learn more about the Linux kernel and how it handles networking
* Learn how kernel vulnerabilities are discovered and patched
